actions.text: Amendment SA 4561 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 4561 proposed by Senator Coburn. (consideration: CR S7369-7370; text: CR S7369) To require that reports required in the bill to be submitted to the Committees on Appropriations and the Department of Homeland Security's annual justifications of the President's budget request shall be posted on the Department of Homeland Security's public website not later than 48 hours after such submission unless information in the report compromises national security.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4561 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4561 proposed by Senator Coburn.

purpose: To require that reports required in the bill to be submitted to the Committees on Appropriations and the Department of Homeland Security's annual justifications of the President's budget request shall be posted on the Department of Homeland Security's public website not later than 48 hours after such submission unless information in the report compromises national security.
